author: chfast
content: If you have some Java experience (especially Gradle), can you check https://github.com/ethereum/evmc/pull/667 ?

author: bbuddha.xyz
content: Has there been any research into parallelizing view/pure functions at the call level (as opposed to the tx level) in EVM? Like if my contract has a ton of view/pure functions to make some checks or to do some complex mathematical operation, it could be parallelized in theory to speed up execution?
